Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptides for Topical Treatment of Osteomyelitis and Implant-Related Infections: Study in the Spongy Bone.
Literature.Author: Melicherčík P, Nesuta O, Cerovský V

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=20µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=10-20µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=3.2µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=5.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=12.7µM),Candida albicans F7-39/IDE99(MIC=12.7µM)
